title: Threat to Buddhism in Myanmar and the arming of Rohingyas
content: – by Shenali D Waduge – When Hannah Beech writes “When Buddhists go bad” not only is it heralded world over but Time Magazine puts as its July cover Burmese monk Wirathu and christens the front cover “Face of Buddhist Terror”.
